title: Camp WeWow Music Week Day 1: Drop the Beat and Cut the Cheese
description:
It's Music Week at Camp WeWow! Today, we're listening to one of our favorite episodes of Wow in the World, "Drop the Beat and Cut the Cheese" We'll be singing and dancing all week, so check back tomorrow for activities, crafts, and more! Visit tinkercast.com/camp for directions to our daily activities and challenges. You can share your tinkerings and tales with us at tinkercast.com/share and at 1-888-7WOW-WOW for the chance to be featured at the “campfire” this Friday!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
